The claim states that Trump: s plan would suspend the 7.65% employer match, which the expert's verdict confirms is incorrect. The employer and employee payroll tax contributions are already separate, and the government had already deferred the employer payment until the end of 2020.
The claim suggests that workers will not: 65% increase in their wage or salary. The expert's verdict acknowledges that it is yet unknown if the deferral will reach the pockets of employees and when.
The expert: s verdict highlights the legitimate questions raised by the claim, even though it predicts the future with too much certainty. This aspect emphasizes the need for further investigation and monitoring of the situation.
